name: Escape (itch) (ikturi)
description:
Humanity is extinct, the earth is in ruins, only a few robots survived, get to your spacecraft to escape.

Solve the obstacles on the track, but beware of your constantly decreasing energy level. Fortunately, you can still find working charging stations where you can charge up the energy level.

 Controls:

  • A   -  move backwards
  •  D  - move forward
  • SHIFT - run
  •  E - use

Map Elements:

Charging Station:

If entering your maximum energy will be charged. At this point there is a checkpoint too.

Box:

You can push and pull boxes, if you are close enough to it, hold down E

Switch:

Switches can activate elements on the map.

There are 3 types:

  • constantly active
  • active until you hold down E
  • timed

Pressure Switch:

Your character or any movable element can activate, if it is on the switch

Generator:

You can charge from your own energy

Fixes:

  • fixed checkpoint system
  • remove delayed jump, change jump force
